TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WindowsSecurityToken extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken

summary.span: 表示以 Windows 網域或使用者帳戶之身分識別為基礎的安全性權杖。

span.span: Represents a security token that is based on the identity of a Windows domain or user account.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般來說，應用程式開人員者並不需要使用 類別，除非 Web 服務必須存取與 安全性權杖關聯之 Windows 網域或使用者帳戶的詳細資料。Typically, application developers do not need to use the class, unless a Web service must gain access to details about the Windows domain or user account associated with the security token. 若要取得 Windows 網域或使用者帳戶的詳細資料，請存取 屬性。To get the details of the Windows domain or user account, access the property.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您完成使用 後，請呼叫 方法。Call the method when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫 方法後，您必須釋放所有對 的參考，讓記憶體回收行程可以回收 所佔用的記憶體。After calling the method, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 方法。Always call the method before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

span.span: A that represents the last instant in time at which this security token is valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設， 安全性權杖的有效時間為 10 個小時。A security token is valid for 10 hours, by default. 屬性會設定為 類別建立的瞬間再加上 10 個小時。The property is set to the instant in time when the class is created plus 10 hours.
